items.sentence: They're almost three times as big as we are.
Let's get rid of everything we aren't using.
I keep myself busy with reading and writing.
The shopping list included a bottle of milk.
You have a very interesting way of speaking.
Of course, you're aware that Tom isn't here.
You're old enough to stand on your own feet.
You're too critical of others' shortcomings.
You can't judge happiness in terms of money.
You shouldn't impose your opinion on others.
You have to finish your homework right away.
You don't have any plants or animals, right?
You should wash your hands before each meal.
You may stay here as long as you keep quiet.
You may come at any time tomorrow afternoon.
You may invite any person who wants to come.
You should be able to read this book easily.
You're satisfied with your life, aren't you?
You seem to be having some serious problems.
Tom doesn't think that I can do it, does he?
